summary.span: Provides the capability to group controls together.

span.span: Provides the capability to group controls together.

summary.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表單代表最外層 ASP.NET 行動網頁內的控制項群組。A form represents the outermost grouping of controls within an ASP.NET mobile Web page. 個別的行動 Web 網頁可以包含多個表單最外層的層級。An individual mobile Web page can contain multiple forms at the outermost level. 不可為巢狀表單。使用控制，如果您想要建立巢狀容器。Forms cannot be nested; use controls if you want to nest containers. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[表單控制項簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a1946a-bb3c-41c8-90cd-f00643525016)。For more information, see [Introduction to the Form Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a1946a-bb3c-41c8-90cd-f00643525016). 若要顯示特定的表單，請將上目前的屬性頁面，以所要的格式，或設定屬性控制項所要的格式。To display a specific form, either set the property on the current page to the desired form, or set the property in a control to the desired form. 您可以包含常值文字，以及其隨附的標記中的文字內容控制項。You can include literal text along with its accompanying markup tags in the text contents of the control. 使用範本，它時，請記得，控制項建立範本中的執行個體表單的方法。When using templates, it is important to remember that the control creates instances of templates in the method for the form. 表單方法之前呼叫`Page_Load`和`Page_Init`。The method for the form is called before `Page_Load` and `Page_Init`. 此外，頁面的建構函式執行過早在中設定範本方法因為尚未建立表單。Also, the page constructor executes too early to set templates in the method because the form is not yet created. 若要修正此問題，攔截 (hook) 表單的自己方法，並建立那里的範本執行個體。To correct this, hook the form's own method, and create an instance of the template there. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[實作樣板化轉譯](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b86d9d1d-ab18-4cad-a825-092826bb3922)。For more information, see [Implementing Templated Rendering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b86d9d1d-ab18-4cad-a825-092826bb3922). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立具有兩種形式，以及兩個形式之間的連結的網頁。The following code example shows how to create a page with two forms along with links between the two forms. 一種格式都有核取方塊清單。One form has a check box list. 已選取項目和**送出**按一下按鈕時，表單就會顯示選取的項目和其值的清單。When items are selected and the **Submit** button is clicked, the form presents a list of the selected items and their values. 請注意，事件方法準備個別的表單以顯示Notice that the event methods prepare the respective forms for display > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 這個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 頁面語法概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileFormSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值、 空字串 ("")，會導致回傳至包含目前表單的網頁。The default value, an empty string (""), causes postbacks to the page containing the current form. 您可以覆寫預設值來提交表單至不同的 URL。You can override the default value to submit the form to a different URL. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性繼承，控制項回傳至繼承的 URL 的表單內容。If the property is inherited, the control posts form contents to the inherited URL.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下列情況下就會發生事件：The event occurs under the following circumstances: - 第一次要求頁面時，會啟動第一種形式。When a page is first requested, the first form is activated. - 當頁的屬性以程式設計方式設定。When the property of the page is set programmatically. - 當使用者巡覽至表單，以透過其目標是一種形式的控制。When the user navigates to a form through a control whose target is a form. 這個事件的事件鏈結中的位置，讓繫結至資料來源的子控制項，或設定可以繼承的所有子控制項的表單屬性非常重要。This event's position in the event chain makes it very important for binding child controls to data sources or for setting a form property that can be inherited by all child controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定`OnActivate`屬性項目時執行的方法所指向就會發生事件。The following code example shows how to set the `OnActivate` attribute in the element to point to a method that executes when the event occurs. `Form2_Activate`方法準備第二種形式顯示。The `Form2_Activate` method prepares the second form for display. 這個範例是針對較大範例的一部分概觀。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 這個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 頁面語法概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-csharp[MobileFormSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[MobileFormSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#8)]

The control on the form that can be paginated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來允許單一控制項來為其內容分頁上的行動裝置和提供的下一頁和上一頁導覽檢視之間的數個檢視透過表單上。The property is used to allow a single control on a form to paginate its contents across several views on mobile devices and providing next and previous navigation between views. 控制項可以對分頁即使其內容包含控制項有其屬性設定為`false`。A control can paginate its contents even if a containing control has its property set to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性類別，以指定哪一個控制項要編頁。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of the class to specify which control to paginate. 範例會建立兩種形式的頁面。The example creates a page with two forms. 一種形式會有很長的字串，在某些裝置上必須要授與使用者存取權的整個文字分頁。One form has a very long string that on some devices must be paginated to give the user access to the entire text. 若要查看執行中的分頁，您必須處理分頁的裝置上檢視此範例。In order to see the pagination in action, you must view the example on a device that handles pagination. 在[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，您可以使用其中一個具有可用的裝置模擬器**裝置模擬器管理員**上**工具**功能表。In [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you can use one of the device emulators available with the **Device Emulator Manager** on the **Tools** menu. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 這個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 頁面語法概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileFormSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default2.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表單會變成非作用中，在下列情況：A form becomes inactive under the following circumstances: - 當頁的屬性以程式設計方式設定為另一種形式。When the property of the page is programmatically set to another form. - 當使用者巡覽至表單，以透過其目標是一種形式的控制。When the user navigates to a form through a control whose target is a form. 如果這些動作都無法發生時，作用中的表單將不會收到事件。If neither of these actions occurs, the active form will never receive a event. 這個事件的事件鏈結中的位置可讓您在重設子控制項、 資料集或全域變數非常重要。This event's position in the event chain makes it very important in resetting the child controls, data set, or global variables. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何捕捉事件，以清除。The following code example demonstrates how to trap the event to clear the . 這個範例是針對較大範例的一部分概觀。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileFormSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[MobileFormSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default.aspx#2)]

[!code-csharp[MobileFormSample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default2.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[MobileFormSample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#5)] 在此範例中，因為不指定任何篩選條件``項目，它一律是。In this example, since no filter is specified for the `` element, it will always be the . 若要指定篩選器變更的項目： `` ，並包含 Web.config 檔，定義您想要使用的篩選條件。To specify a filter change the element to: `` and include a Web.config file that defines the filters you want to use. returns.span: A set of forms that are linked to the current form.

span.span: A set of forms that are linked to the current form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當表單包含啟動另一個表單，而不與伺服器互動的瀏覽項目時，它會被視為連結的表單。When a form contains navigation elements that activate another form without interacting with the server, it is considered to be a linked form. 有數個因素相關視為 表單的連結。There are several factors involved for a form to be considered linked. 例如，如果下列三個條件均符合，表單 B 會被視為其中一種形式連結至表單：For example, if the following three stipulations are met, Form B is considered to be one of the forms linked to Form A: - 包含表單的控制項與表單 B.為其目的地Form A contains a control with its destination as Form B. - 表單的不包含事件處理常式。Form A does not contain an event handler. - 表單 B 沒有事件處理常式。Form B has no event handler. 不同的是一組不需要傳輸控制項之間的伺服器互動的所有表單。The distinction is the set of all forms that do not require server interactions to transfer control between.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`get`要求會受限於它可以張貼的資料量。A `get` request is limited in the amount of data it can post. 使用時，某些回傳類型可能會失敗`get`要求。Some types of postbacks might fail when using a `get` request. 優點`get`要求為所有參數都指定為可以快取或儲存 URL 和 URL 的一部分。The advantage of a `get` request is that all the parameters are specified as part of the URL, and the URL can be cached or saved. 項目`post`內所包含的要求。The elements of a `post` request are contained within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當通知由這個方法時，伺服器控制項都必須執行建立及設定執行個體所需的任何初始化步驟。When notified by this method, server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在這個階段的伺服器控制項的生命週期中，控制項的檢視狀態尚未填入。In this stage of the server control's lifecycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外，您無法存取其他伺服器控制項，會呼叫這個方法是，無論它是子系或父至此控制項時。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called either, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 其他伺服器控制項不一定要建立並準備好進行存取。Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.

exception.span: The form is contained by another form.

span.span: The form is contained by another form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制公開屬性和屬性，提供目前的表單重新編頁的相關資訊。The control exposes the property and the property, which provide information about how the current form is paginated. 屬性也可協助提供瀏覽至其他頁面的功能。The property also helps provide navigation capability to another page. 例如，呈現時更豐富的裝置上，搜尋結果表單可能包括裝置特定 UI 項目，讓使用者在瀏覽至 結果數目，而非連結導覽的頁面。For example, when rendering on a richer device, a search results form might include device-specific UI elements that allow the user to browse to a page of results by number rather than by link navigation. > [!NOTE] > 這個值可供之後已發生事件。This value is available after the event has occurred. 若要取得屬性，您可以處理表單的事件。To get the property, you can handle the event of the form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of the control. 這個程式碼範例是一個較大範例的一部分屬性。This code example is part of a larger example for the property. [!code-csharp[MobileFormSample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default2.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[MobileFormSample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以程式設計方式設定這個屬性，它不會保存每個要求。If this property is set programmatically, it is not persisted for each request. 如果以宣告方式設定屬性，屬性會保存每個要求。If the property is set declaratively, the property is persisted for each request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是來自較大範例的屬性。This code example is from a larger example for the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 表單是呈現每個要求之前重新編頁。A form is paginated prior to rendering each request. 分頁完成之後，就會發生事件。After pagination is complete, the event occurs. 此事件發生之後，表單的屬性包含表單的實際頁數。After this event occurs, the property of the form contains the actual number of pages for the form. ## Examples 如需完整的程式碼範例，請參閱範例的屬性。For a complete code example, see the example for the property.

span.span: The title can be rendered as part of the form, on devices that support a title separate from page content (for example, on the title bar of a browser using the title tag in HTML).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援的裝置之網頁內容以外的標題，您可以呈現在表單的標題。For devices that support a title separate from the page content, you can render the title as part of the form.
